title: Can't redeem my dreadknight garen code
body: When i try to redeem my code for the free garen skin i get an error. It says "There was a problem fullfilling your store items, please try again. If this problem persists please contact us at support.riotgames.com." Anyone know the fix?

replies.body: These promos are a bit old these days so it can run into problems sometimes.  No worries, I've added the colossus to your account for you.  :D
Hello! I also have a problem getting the Garen skin.Could you help me, please? I have followed the page and everything and it still doesn't work.Thank you!
same here have the pass and the same error apears to me

Hi, 

as above I have the same problem, the received  code for "dreadknight garen" does not work. Could you help me?

https://imgur.com/a/NHeLf

Hi 2hotAshCharms,

~~Please make sure that your Dreadknight Garen skin code was for the correct region. If you are sure that you redeemed for the correct region, you'll need to [submit a ticket](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M) about this.~~

Edit: Porocles has super powers!
